mapper.select: SELECT R.REC_CD , R.STU_NO , (SELECT CMD.COMD_NM FROM COMMON_DETAIL CMD WHERE R.RGB_CD = CMD.COMD_CD) AS RGB_CD , R.REC_YR , R.REC_SEM , R.REC_PER , R.REC_RSN , R.REC_DT , (SELECT CMD.COMD_NM FROM COMMON_DETAIL CMD WHERE R.REC_YN = CMD.COMD_CD) AS REC_YN , R.REC_REJ FROM RECORD R, STUDENT S, COMMON_DETAIL CD WHERE R.STU_NO = S.STU_NO AND CD.COMD_CD = R.RGB_CD AND R.STU_NO = #{stuNo}
SELECT (SELECT COMD_NM FROM COMMON_DETAIL WHERE RGB_CD = COMD_CD)AS RGB_CD , REC_YR , REC_SEM , REC_PER , REC_RSN FROM RECORD WHERE REC_CD = #{recCd}

SELECT R.REC_CD , R.STU_NO , R.RGB_CD , R.REC_YR , R.REC_SEM , R.REC_PER , R.REC_RSN , R.REC_DT , CD.COMD_NM AS REC_YN , R.REC_REJ FROM RECORD R LEFT OUTER JOIN COUNSEL CS ON R.REC_CD = CS.REC_CD, STUDENT S, COMMON_DETAIL CD, COMMON C WHERE R.STU_NO = S.STU_NO AND CD.COM_CD = C.COM_CD AND CD.COMD_CD = R.REC_YN AND R.STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND CS.REC_CD IS NULL
